thread.title: Seven Corners Hires New Business Development Director

author: cnbc.com
title: Seven Corners Hires New Business Development Director
text:
INDIANAPOLIS--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Innovative international travel insurance and specialty benefit management provider Seven Corners, Inc. announces today that James Capozzi has joined the company as business development director.
Capozzi will focus on negotiating financially beneficial reimbursement arrangements with local hospitals, surgery centers, and ancillary facilities to provide a robust Provider Network for the Federal Bureau of Prisons. He brings more than a decade of contract development and management experience to this position, along with an expansive knowledge of the insurance industry. Capozzi’s addition to Seven Corners follows a flurry of new C-suite and director-level hires in 2017.
Prior to joining Seven Corners’ team, Capozzi served as director of network development and credentialing for LifePlans, Inc., a company that helps health and long-term care insurers manage risk. Prior to that, he worked for Correct Care Solutions where he directed hospital and specialty provider contract initiatives for state and federal correctional facilities.
“We are thrilled to have James join the Seven Corners team,” said Justin Tysdal, co-founder and CEO of Seven Corners. “With his notable business development experience, we look forward to the new opportunities and growth James will bring to the company’s portfolio and our contracts with the Federal Bureau of Prisons.”
Seven Corners has administered health care for the Federal Bureau of Prisons for 11 years. During this time, the company has continually received superior ratings on annual performance reviews and currently manages 16 federal prisons across the United States.
For more information about Seven Corners, please visit SevenCorners.com . Seven Corners is a member of the US Travel Insurance Association (UStiA) and is an A+ rated Better Business Bureau accredited company. In addition, Seven Corners was recently named a finalist in the 12th annual Stevie Awards, recognized in the “Customer Service Team of the Year” category.
About Seven Corners, Inc.
Founded in 1993, Seven Corners, Inc. is an innovative and service focused international travel insurance and specialty benefit management company. Based in Carmel, Ind. and serving a global market, Seven Corners offers a wide variety of customized travel solutions to international travelers, agencies of the U.S. government, corporations, foreign governments and various types of insurance companies. For more information on its products, visit www.sevencorners.com .
